ygData.subject: Long time no see!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi guys, still remember me?  Ziltus Planeswalker ;) Can I check with u guys, if I stop payment for my EQ acct, will Verant delete my chars?  I ve not been
ygData.messageBody:
Hi guys, still remember me? Ziltus Planeswalker ;)

Can I check with u guys, if I stop payment for my EQ acct, will Verant
delete my chars? I've not been playing EQ for almost 1/2 yr and was paying
U$9.95 every month. With the new land coming up in UO, I intend to
re-activate my 2nd UO acct (more chars to own house) and stop paying for my
EQ acct. Say if Verant dun allow me to stop pym (provided I wanna keep my
chars), how much can I sell my wiz acct in EQ (with the best enchanter
jewelries for wiz, Jboot, robe and staff etc)?

Thx.
